overview:
I have started another company called Mosoroâ„¢ which is a software company that is building a developer platform that allows the 100â€™s of thousands of Android and iPhone developers a simpler way to build smartphone apps that connect to small functionality hardware.

Prior to starting Mosoro I created Firebreakâ„¢, by Odojoâ„¢, allowing parents to monitor their childâ€™s Social Networks for inappropriate content & the Internet for leaks of personal information. I concluded the sale of Odojo to SafetyWeb in July of 2010.

Prior to starting Odojo, I was credited with creating numerous companies in the physical personalization space. These physical personalization companies; SkinIt, Original Wraps, & Bottle Wraps, have all become the industry leaders in their respective categories. Prior to entering the personalization space I created nReach, a mobile content distribution company, which was sold to a public company in 2004.

When not creating companies I am a sponsored athlete who runs across the deserts of the world and a Governor Appointee to The Colorado Governors Council For Physical Fitness.

I welcome the chance to share my knowledge of starting, growing and selling companies, and look forward to creating new relationships with talented persons in the technology/athletic space.

milestones.source_description: SafetyWeb Acquires Odojo In Battle To Monitor The Youngsters
